Marina Bay Sands and Resorts World Sentosa are the only two casinos licensed to operate in Singapore. GRA regulates their operations under the Casino Control Act.Casinos on cruise ships operate outside Singapore and are not regulated by us.Keep an eye out for more gambling regulation updates. GRASingapore GamblingRegulatoryAuthority

Meet Jian Yong, Senior Manager in GRA's Operations Policy Division, recipient of the Minister for Home Affairs National Day Award (Individual)!Jian Yong was a key player in GRA's digitalisation transformation where he developed the Automated Licence and Permit System during his time with the Licensing and Monitoring Division. "I'm thankful for the award and proud to have been part of GRA's digital transformation journey, he says.Congratulations to Jian Yong! Leave a congratulatory message below!GRARegulators MeetTheTeamGRASingapore GamblingRegulatoryAuthority
